name: Skyfear
description:
BATTLE FOR BLOODCharge into visceral dogfights and dirt brawls. Make your mark. Skyfear is a fast-paced hybrid of aerial, shooting, and melee combat. Play casually, competitively, versus AI, or in versatile custom games.NO MANKINDLong before the age of man, there were reptiles. And long before then, the wilderness was ruled by terrifying biology from the stars. Skyfear takes place in a dark, prehistoric world, where only the top predators survive.FEATURES
  • Extensive character customization
  • Variety of battle environments
  • Casual, ranked, and custom games
  • Bots support!

Inspired by genre-defining shooters of the seventh console generation, Skyfear aims to deliver varied content based on solid, core gameplay. Please FOLLOW this page to catch updates and more information.
